c:attribute.name: devicestate
c:attribute.values: SAFE, WEATHER, SMOKE, CO, PRE_SMOKE, EOL, LOW_BATTERY, VERY_LOW_BATTERY, FAILED_BATTERY

c:attribute.name: room
c:attribute.description: This is the room type description for the location of the Halo device, which can be read out in an alert.

c:attribute.name: roomNames
c:attribute.description: Mapping of halo:room enum keys to human readable room names supported by this device

c:attribute.name: remotetestresult
c:attribute.description: Response code from remote test of the halo test feature.

c:attribute.name: haloalertstate
c:attribute.description: State of the Iris system, as transmited to Halo to be indicated to the user through lights and sound.

c:method.name: StartHush
c:method.description: Start a new hush process (assumes device is in pre-alert state).

c:return.name: hushstarted
c:return.description: Was the halo in a proper state to start hush: smoke per-alert or smoke alert (but not denied due to >4% UL requirement).

c:method.name: SendHush
c:method.description: Send when user says Halo is flashing a particular color.

c:parameter.name: color
c:parameter.description: Color the user says is being currently displayed by Halo in the Hush process.

c:method.name: CancelHush
c:method.description: Cancel out of current hush process.

c:method.name: StartTest
c:method.description: Run test cycle on the Halo. Should be moved to some generic capability.
